text: The 2012–13 FC Liefering season was the first season under this name. They started in the Regionalliga West because they gained the licence of USK Anif. As winner of two relegation matches the club was promoted to the Second league. ==Squad == 2012/13 * Goalkeepers: 21 Thomas Dähne (23/0), 30 Domenik Schierl (7/0), 1 Georg Blatnik (11/0) * Defenders: 2 Stefan Lainer (28/2), 5 René Aufhauser (25/4), 26 Andre Ramalho Silva (19/2), 3 Daniel Hölzl (0/0), 32 Emre Uygur (11/1), 7 Andreas Schrott (12/2), 4 Arif Sari (9/0), 11 Goran Kreso (0/0), ? Lukas Gugganig (0/0) * Midfielders: 28 Florian Metz (1/0), 22 Robert Völkl (27/2), 16 Stefan Schwendinger (15/0), 14 Nikola Dovedan (17/4), 17 Felix Adjei (29/7), 18 Josip Corić (23/16), 24 Stefan Savic (22/7), 25 Sandro Djuric (28/4), 6 Matthias Felber (12/2), 23 Daniel Krenn (11/1) * Forwards: 9 Wolfgang Mair (28/10), 8 Andreas Bammer (19/13), 19 Mario Konrad (27/13), 15 Sebastian Drga (1/0), 22 Alexander Aschauer (10/2), Bright Edomwonyi (3/2) * Coaching staff: Peter Zeidler (Head coach), Zsolt Löw (Assistance coach), Heinz Arzberger (Goalkeeper coach) (Matches/goals) ===Matches=== FC Salzburg Wiki ==Relegation matches == FC Liefering had to play two relegationmatches versus the champion of the Regionalliga Mitte LASK. ==Friendly matches == FC Salzburg Wiki ==References == Category:2012 in association football Category:2013 in association football Category:FC Liefering
title: 2012–13 FC Liefering season
